sense.def:
A particular sort of something
je eden izmed več tipov ali skupin nečesa.

seg.quote: ‘What sort of iron did she get?’—‘A steam iron.’
There were five different sorts of biscuits.

sense.def:
To sort things
pomeni razvrstiti stvari v skupine.

seg.quote: Minnie was in the office, sorting mail.
They had got mixed up and needed to be sorted into three sets.
She was wearing a sort of velvet dress.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
of sorts
označujemo tisto, kar ni preveč kakovostno.

seg.quote: Farlow was a lawyer of sorts.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekdo počuti
out of sorts
, se ne počuti preveč dobro ali pa je nezadovoljen.

To sort out a group of things
pomeni urediti skupino stvari.

seg.quote: It took a while to sort out all our luggage.

sense.def:
To sort out a problem
pomeni lotiti se težave in najti rešitev zanjo.
